description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Elegant Bavarian Alps Escape with Panoramic Views, Onsite Dining & Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Stay at the foot of the majestic Zugspitze in a chic Mercure hotel that offers the perfect blend of relaxation, adventure and Bavarian charm. This idyllic retreat is just a stone's throw from Germany's highest peak, offering a wealth of activities from hiking to skiing. Unwind by the pool, sauna or steam bath and savour regional cuisine at the Alt-Partenkirchen restaurant and beer garden. Situated directly on the historic Ludwigstrasse, the hotel is a gateway to year-round outdoor pursuits - hiking trails, alpine pastures, the Zugspitzbahn, and iconic landmarks like the Partnachklamm gorge are all within easy reach. Discover Garmisch-Partenkirchenâ€™s natural beauty, invigorating climate and timeless appeal across every season.
